blog_posts.title: What Are You Going to Do With Your Life?
blog_posts.context: Written as a freshman at Rice University for an entrepreneurship class that inspired Mike to explore his own future ideas
blog_posts.summary: A personal reflection on Mike's family legacy in shipping software, growing up with entrepreneurial parents, how his parents' divorce became a turning point, and his journey to building the Veson Nautical Mobile App
key_themes: Family legacy: Grandfathers Kostantinos Douzinas (Nautical Technology Corporation) and Michael Veson (Veson Inc.) both founded shipping software companies
Parents co-founding Veson Nautical by combining their fathers' company names
Growing up watching his parents build a company from their Boston apartment
Parents' divorce as a wake-up call that made entrepreneurship feel more attainable
Working with his father to develop the Veson Nautical Mobile App while in school
The mobile app launching in Greece 20 years after Veson Nautical was founded
